content.detailedDescription: My girlfriend and i were laying down at the base of steamboat mountain to look for satellites and shooting stars.  had spent about 20 minutes tracking various satellites when we both noticed almost instaneously, 2 vaguely (triangular?) shapes moving quickly south to north along the same general backround as the milky way.  the shapes were about three times the size of the satellites we were tracking and about half as bright.  both objects were side-by-side and moving significantly faster than the satellites we were tracking.  once we had adjusted to their flight path, a 3rd similar object came from the west and "met up" with the other 2 objects in a diagonal path.  we tracked the 3 objects for another second or so before they were sufficiently to the north that we could not see them anymore.  total viewing time was approx 8-10 seconds.  there were no observable lights or fluctuations in the flight path.  we both talked about the experience for about 10 minutes and agreed that they were not satellites (larger and faster moving), birds (uniform speeds and trajectories) or airplanes (no lights, sounds and faster).
content.summary: 3 objects noted flying south to north

content.detailedDescription: skywatching on open porch area in back yard with a friend. we were playing our digerydoo. i had put mine down and we were starring up at the sky. the sky was clear and we could see plenty of stars. the ufo came into my line of sight as it moved overhead, i was surprised to see this and said 'look at that" as i pointed to where i was looking. he did not see it as it was gone in 5 seconds. it flew in a straight line and seemed to be self luminous ,giving off a pinkish orange light and had what looked like wings that i clearly saw vibrating. the object came into my view when i first noticed it.I first thought it looked like an organic form as the wings were more vibrating than flapping. i was very surprised and pleased to have seen it,and actually said outloud. "can you make another pass again or a return trip in the opposite direction"  the object simply vanished from my sight. as mufon in asd i was very happy to have seen this. it is the second time i have had a sighting from my back yard. the first being in 1999. i am also a part of the iccra. we have been to some crop circles lately, so the next day we were looking on the internet for the latest designs in england. we found one at silbury hill had just been reported on july 9. the design is very similar to the shape of the ufo that i had seen. roger sugden asd
content.summary: Self luminous football shapewith wing like appendage moving straightline to nw

content.detailedDescription: I was outside a friends house standing with friends outside a party. we all looked into the sky and we saw these orange star like objects flying high in the sky, traveling all at the same speed, in the same direction in no apparrent formation. when i first notciced the objects i thourt that it may be some kind of planes flying but then roughy a hundred of them all appeared from nowhere. we all saw them and i even called my family to tell them, they looked and saw exactly what we all saw outside the party...Hundreds of orange spots, moving at a steady speed in the sky. after watching the objects move for many minuites they all started to dissappear when they reached a certain place in the sky. i had never seen anythink like this before, all of us stared in curosity and fasination. something else...All the animals and pets down the street and round the area all made noises, as though they were petrified. i tried to video this event on my mobilephone, but iut was too dark to pick anything up. if anyone has witnesed another event just like this, please notify me ans it will be most helpful and interesting, thankyou.
content.summary: Hundred of traveling bright orange lights.

content.detailedDescription: I was standing in my back yard looking nw when i noticed a bright orange-crystaline object. object was stationary. it was visable to me for about 5 seconds, and then just "blinked out". this object was similar to the objects we saw 4/16/05 in same area of sky, at approximitly the same time. color and intensity of the objects were the same. this object was seen at 21:20. my reaction to this event was one of awe and wonderment! after the april sighting, i really didn't think i would see another one.
content.summary: Saw bright orange light in nw sky. object stationary. visual for about 5 sec. similar to 4/16/05 sighting. same area.

content.detailedDescription: At a restaurant called, "il fornaio", eating at outside patio. saw object flying in distance. surrounding tables and waiters all saw object and all observed it for the 20 minutes it flew overhead. could not be weather balloons because of how it changed directions because it was so high up, jet stream would have sent it in one specific direction. at least thirty patrons and restaurant workers all responded the same way and observed it until the object disappeared while heading directly upwards.
content.summary: A high altitude object with three individual objects connected to each other by a flexible connection of some sort flew over pasadena area, hover one direction, then turning and flying straight up.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home on bryant rd. going north. the two lights (red and green) first made me notice the object. first thought maybe it was just a small airplane but as it got closer and was above us, i noticed a third light(yellow)and it seemed to be triangular in shape. it was about 100 - 150 ft above us moving very slowly and making no sound. i told my son to get the camera so he could take a picture of the object while i turned the car around to follow it. once we turned around, the object had sped up to a great speed making it impossible to catch up.
content.summary: Saw an object with three different colored light moving slowly and quietly above us.

content.detailedDescription:
We were leaving the 4th of july celebration at grafton ponds with several friends.  we looked up at the sky and noticed a round object flying overhead.  the object was surrounded by orange lights that seemed to flash around the perimeter of the object.

we were all enthralled by its appearance and watched it until we could no longer see it.
content.summary: Round orange craft flew overhead

content.detailedDescription: Watching television and heard helicopter. went outside to investigate. looked nnw and saw flickering light in sky. thought it was a childs silver balloon at first. object moved slowly either north or down and then to the east. when object shifted from shiny to dark it appeared to be a cube shape. observed for eleven minutes. my attention was taken away by a high flying airliner that was flying nnw and when i again looked the object had disappeared. this object appeared to be far away and i observed it through binoculars. i knew i was looking at something unusual, or had the feeling i was anyway.
content.summary: Erratic flashing object turned bright white to brownish color alternating

content.detailedDescription:
I was standing in my horse pasture when i took the photo.
i take random snapshots of the sky frequently. i didn't notice anything unusual until i had downloaded the photos into my computer. i am enclosing the original photo where there is a chemtrail (i think) and above that is the object in question. in the upper right part of the photo is a hawk which i left in because the original photo is untouched. in the other photo is the object that i greatly enlarged. i did not focus or do anything else to the photo. feel free to do anything to the original you want for your own analysis. the camera was pointed in an easterly direction when the photo was taken.
content.summary: Random snapshot

content.detailedDescription:
Note: the exact date of the event is a bit unknown to me, i can only remember that it was 5 or 6 years ago near the end of summer.

somewhere between 10 and 12 p.M. on a relatively isolated road somewhere near the carmel, in mejier (which is where we were headed) my twin brother, father, and i had an encounter with a large, floating triangular shaped object. in our station wagon with our dad driving we were seated in the back of the vehicle. my brother initially spotted the object coming to the left of our vehicle. it matched our velocity and followed directly above our vehicle for fifteen minutes or so. it made no sound and had red, white, and blue lights on its three tips (we both made note of this thing in particular). i couldn't see significantly above this craft as it was directly above us, but i had the impression it was pyramidal in shape (looking back i swear i saw another light on the top of the object when it left us but my brother saw no light). it followed us just above the tree tops, which i estimate was probably 20-30 feet above our car (possibly even less it was incredibly close to our car). my perspective of it was massive (it covered a good portion of the sky above our vehicle) but its size was probably about three to five times our car's size. it gently rolled back and forth very slightly between the left and right windows of our car; allowing us to see it above our car while we were inside of it. the object seemed to hover more toward where my brother and i were sitting in the center of the car. my father, as he was driving, never looked up to see the object. it seemed odd to me that he didn't look up, but we never actually arrived at a place where he could or would stop the car. the purpose of this object has always been baffling to me, but it seemed distinctly interested in our vehicle and ours alone. another odd thing i noticed when we were driving is that there didn't appear to be any people near our vehicle (on foot or in other cars). the only other vehicle i possibly i spotted was probably a mile behind us. when we approached the nearby mejier the object veered away (back to the left, the direction it came from), i never saw it rise a significant height but it seemed to move off to the horizon. my brother and i tracked it as long as we could until it looked like a multiple colored star in the distance. it remained stationary and i eventually assumed that this was in fact a star and not the object itself. we may have mistaken this star for the object in the distance as we lost sight of it, or it may have remained stationary for some reason at that point. we looked back in that direction when we came out of the mejier and the light remained, and i assumed it was a star.
content.summary: Triangular craft with red, white, and blue lights on its tips

content.detailedDescription: I was watching tv when andre,my stepson,yelled;"look outside in the yard! shut up,i hollered,and go to sleep. "its a u.F.O." he screams. my wife and i go running outside and at about 200 yds out and just above the trees was a 30 ft metalic object. on the bottom was a red dome that emitted light in sinc with a low frequency,moduation. like a weak station at the lower end of the f.M. dial,but loud,at 5 sec. apart. we watched it go down slowly behind davis pond. there was little doubt what we saw. i called the montville police and told them it was a small aircraft that crashed. an officer came in 10 min. we drove down turner rd. and heard the humming from behind the sandpit. we walked threw the pit and around the swamp only to see at 100 ft,the object spewing out sparks,like carbon arc welding. we decided to leave , frightened. the officer did not report the indicent. for all i know, its still there! i've never gone back!
content.summary: 3 witness 30 ft.Metalic ,mist covered egg shaped disk  with red light land.

content.detailedDescription: I was 12 years old i went night fishing with my brother and 4 friends ages ranged from 12 to 18 years old. we walked about 3 miles out of town it was around 9-10pm. it was very quiet and dark, my 2 friends and i left to a different fishing spot while my brother and 2 friends stayed in the same fixhing spot like 1/4 of a mile apart from we were.While we were fishing a round object with bright lights with different colors out of nowhere stoped very fast across the road approx 400 yards away from us (very close)and it hoverd low over a field 200ft of the ground for 1 min. it dropped around 50ft so fast and hovered with no noise for 2 min we did not speak to each other we just stared at the object i was asking my self what is that i never seen any thing so fast.And i had a feelimg as if somthing was after the object. after it hovered it left so fast that i remember seeing streaks of lights behind it. after the object left my friends and i began to walk back to my brother and my other friends, as we approached my friend alex he asked us "did you see that shit" i was scared and wanted to go home my friends were acting as if they were no scared but i think they were. my mom picked us up down the road from we were at earlier and we told her right away. we got home and i told my dad with exitement becuase i was not scared any more. ever since that day i have had special interest and researched ufo's.
content.summary: Round, 150-200 ft diamater, luminated different colors of lights,fast, no noise

content.detailedDescription: I just got home from work. the time was 11:34 p.M. i got out of  my car and noticed how unusually illuminated the sky was. i was way to captivated by the stars to take my eyes off of them. i observed the sky mostly to the n.E. direction because that was the most illuminated by the stars. 5 to 10 minutes into my star gazing i saw a fireball go from the n.W. direction in a straight path to the s.E. i had my suspicion that it may be something burning in the earths atmosphere, but held my suspicion due to the size, speed, and the fact that i never witnessed this before. approximately 5 to 10 minutes later i saw 5 brightly lit, but unusually illuminated objects fly from the s.E. to the n.W. they seemed to have more of a "glow in the dark effect". there was absolutely no sound and the light seemed to have a mirage effect, kind of like when cool air meets hot air. i had a really hard time determing the size or distance of these objects. they flew close togeather but moved so erratically seperate from each other i had little doubt that these lights were not one object but 5 seperate entities. i don't know what i saw. i just wanted to report this to mufon just in case someone else notified you of this sighting. when i seen the objects i got excited ran in my house and tried to wake my wife up to observe the lights. she did not wake up. so i walked out the back door and continued to watch the lights until they seemed to just disapear. this all happened so fast i did'nt know what the hell to do. this experience changed my life dramatically.
content.summary: From n.W. to s.E. a huge fire ball drifted across the sky then dissapeared. 5 minutes later 5 lights drifted from s.E to n.W.

content.detailedDescription: My friend and i had decided to take a quick cruise on our motorcycles at about 10:15 pm.  at approximately 10:30 we were coming up on the final turn onto our road.  my friend was ahead of me.  he made the turn, as i came up to it, i thought i saw an orange light out of the corner of my eye directly north of us.  but, when i looked up, nothing was there.  i looked back down, and saw my friend had shut his bike off in the middle of the street.  i pulled up and asked him what he was doing.  he said, "did you see that?"  i said, "the orange light?  yeah, i saw it for a split second, but it was gone."  he said that when he turned on our road he could see it for about a full second, and it simply disappeared.  we made our way back home, and stood around in the driveway talking about what we had seen.  about 5 minutes later (10:36 pm or so) we saw the light again.  it was low enough to get lost behind some trees.  it was about as large as if you held a pea out at arms length, and very bright.  we ran out to the road to re-aquire the light.  we watched it for about 30 seconds, it was north of us, heading south, right at us.  it didn't seem to be traveling very fast.  then, like before, it disappeared.  it didn't look like something was simply 'turned off.'  it looked as if the light caved in on itself.  we went inside to grab the video camera, sure that the light would return.  we went back outside, and waited.  we didn't see the orange light again, but, at about 10:45 pm to our disbelief we saw what appeared to be a triangle with a solid red light at each corner.  there was no sound, and no flashing lights.  it was traveling se at a pretty high speed.  assuming it's altitude to be around 30,000 ft.  i would say it was moving at about 500-600 mph, and would be much larger than an airliner.  at this point, we realized the battery for our camera was dead.  30 seconds later, it was only visable as a small red speck in the sky, that faded to nothing.  a few minutes later, my friend was in the garage, and i was standing just outside of it.  i glanced over our house, and saw what i thought to be a very bright star.  i looked away, thinking to myself i didn't remember seeing a star that bright in that position in the sky.  i looked back and noticed it was moving north, slowly.  as it moved it was dimming.  by the time i yelled at my friend, and he ran out, it was about half as bright as it was origionally.  we watched it slowly move north and fade in intensity for about 20 seconds.  before it was totally faded out, we observed a 'core', something solid the ligt was coming from.  it simply was not visable once the light had dimmed completely.  we were scared through each of these observations.  i am unsure of what, but, there is definitely something going on out here.  this is not the first time that i have seen strange things in the sky in recent months.  i have seen things by myself, as well with one or two witnesses (my room mates).
content.summary: Dissappearing orange light, and more.
4thjulyfireworks in our culdesac, we(20+people)witnessed odd,very odd hovering,red pulsating light

I saw a point of light high up in the ne sky. it looked like a star and was traveling in a straight line. it then did a big arcing turn, disappeared then reappeared, did another turn and then disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
About one weekend a month we go over to friends house to have dinner, and then sit out back on their porch to smoke cigars, cigarettes and have some beers.  when this activity takes us into the evening, ���the girls��� get out their astronomy book to look up and discuss the constellations that we can see (during any particular time of year).  that saturday night we (myself, john, elly, steph, and michelle (john was in the bathroom at the time of the incident)) noticed a few shooting stars, so we began to pay particular attention to the sky.  about 10:30-ish, i saw an object coming from west moving east, and i said, ���what is that!���  everyone looked at where i was looking at, and had the same surprise reaction that i had to it.  we (me and elly) got out of our chairs to step out into the middle of the yard to get a better view of this object.  the object crossed the sky but did not follow the curve of the sky, in which it should have disappeared over the horizon, but instead it seemed to have just kept going strait ���out���, due east, and it seemed to have disappeared about ���10 degrees��� above the horizon.  as it was moving out of sight, it seemed to me that the object split into two, but the object was quite blurry at that point to me.  the person i was standing beside (elly) gasped and said that the object just ���zigzagged��� then disappeared.

i have glasses that i use to see distances clearly, unfortunately i did not have them that evening.  when i do not have my glasses i can easily make out the shape of airplanes with their lights on in the night sky, but this object had no lights and it appeared to be high in the sky, and i could still make out a basic triangular shape of it, which in my opinion means that the object was very big.  

because we ���watch��� the sky regularly, and we live by ft indiantown gap (the gap), and harrisburg international airport (hia), we pay attention to the airplanes that we see, more for casual conversation pieces then anything else.  airplanes usually take about a minute to cross the sky unless they are some of the jets out from the gap, or from the air national guard unit at hia.  but when they cross the sky quickly like that, they are low and you can hear them, and clearly make out what they are.  this object crossed the sky in about 15-20 seconds, and as stated earlier it had no lights and made no sound.  

i asked what everyone thought it looked like and what they thought it was.  one person said she (michelle) originally thought it was a bat, because of it shape, but when i made a ���big deal��� about it she could clearly see it was too high in the sky, and moving way to fast to be an animal.  she did not get out of her chair to watch it so it left her sight as it passed into the trees.  she only saw it for about 5-10 seconds.  elly who went out into the yard with me, said that it has a basic shape of a ���stealth fighter���, and she states she clearly saw it ���zigzag��� before it disappeared.  steph had no opinion except that it looked like nothing she ever saw before.  michelle and steph went home shortly after the ���incident���.  we (me, john, who saw nothing, and his wife elly) stayed up and watched the sky intently.  

that night we saw about dozen-ish shooting stars, 9 airplanes (after the incident), 6 satellites, (which is unusual in itself), 2 birds (probably geese) and one unknown object. 

answer to question area/technical:  we live near an airport, power station (tmi), railroad, military instillation (ft. indiantown gap, and power lines because of the railroad.
content.summary: Saw a triangular-ish object cross the sky, zigzag, and then disappear before passing beyond the horizon.

content.detailedDescription:
I was in my backyard with my telescope (41x mag, 60mm refractor, f/15) and a pair of 10x50mm binoculars to look for this very object(s) as seen last 4th of july at the same time in the same general area of the sky.

i first spotted it a 9:03pm (sprint time on my cell phone) at approximately 123-degrees magnetic bearing from my location at approx. 7-degrees elevation.  it was a bright, steady red light, comparable in brightness to that of the red navigation light on a small general aviation aircraft, of which there were two or three in the south pattern at gillespie field airport at the time.  the color of red seemed slightly deeper than standard navigation light red.  the object was moving very slowly but steadily from south to north and ascending slightly.  after about 5 minutes, it began to flicker a bit.  the flickering progressed with time to where at 9:15pm it was flickering as if a flame being blown by wind.  no regularity to the flickering.

at 9:17pm, the light flickered out as if it was a flame source that ran out of fuel.  i watched it through the telescope as the last glimmer of its light flickered out...And it was gone.  last bearing, 107-deg magnetic, 12-deg elevation.  (based on alignment with polaris(north star) and subtracting local magnetic variation of about 14-deg.)


its appearance through the telescope gave no more details than looking at a bright star through the telescope.  there was no smoke trail visible as i might expect from a burning flare.  flares can leave a smoke trail in the air that their own light will illuminate.  there was no parachute or balloon visible that might have been illuminated by the light of a flare.  no falling sparks visible.

the 9pm local airport weather reports:
montgomery fld - clear 64/56 75% nw6  29.97r
gillespie fld - clear 66/55 68%  calm 29.97r
ramona        - clear 59/53 80%  w6   29.98r

winds aloft forecast for san 050600z (forecast period begins 2 hours after the event, but should be close):
3000 feet  -- 320deg @ 7kts
6000 feet  -- 280 @ 12 -- +22deg c
9000 feet  -- 250 @ 17 -- +18deg c
12000 ft   -- 250 @ 21 -- +11deg c
18000 ft   -- 310 @ 09 -- -4deg c
24000 ft   -- 270 @ 16 -- -17deg c
30000 ft   -- 270 @ 24 -- -33deg c
34000 ft   -- 280 @ 35 -- -41deg c
39000 ft   -- 290 @ 34 -- -51deg c
45000 ft   -- 290 @ 27 -- -63deg c
53000 ft   -- 280 @ 14 -- -70deg c

my guess is that this was some sort of smokeless flare or other high intensity red flaming device carried aloft by one or more black helium ballons.  it may have been launched from the vicinity of grossmont college and carried to the east by light winds to over el cajon where it extinguished.  last year i saw two such objects simultaneously, for the same duration, on the same date, at the same time, in the same general area of the sky.  and those objects appeared and behaved the same.  someone's pulling a prank.
content.summary: One red light low in the sky to the east-southeast - over el cajon , ca - not an aircraft

content.detailedDescription: Stood in garden smoking a cigerette. looked up at night sky and noticed stars were visable. noticed a bright light (brighter than all surrounding stars) moving in an easterly direction. at first thought it was a plane though no contrail was visable nor were any nav lights or such. if it were a plane it was moving far to fast to be at high altitude and would have made a noise. only indication of altitude was when it moved out of sight above the cloud layer to the east. reason for suspecting a ufo was the speed in which it traveled accross the sky. i have only seen satalights with the aid night vission equipment and therefore eliminated that. brightness was constant but could not make out anything else. too dark for my camera. somebody else must have noticed it. i felt compelled to report it to someone. i have never whitnessed anything like it. hope i'm not waisting anybodys time. regards.
content.summary: Bright light moving in an easterly direction med alt very fast

content.detailedDescription: Iseen it and i ran like hell got in my truck and got gone on 19 e going west. it was floting in air no sound. it was a long time before i satd anything to anybody.Be cause i dindnt think nobody would belive me.
content.summary: Large silver disk 100 yards in dia. oval windows large opening in bottem lights that bent

content.detailedDescription: I was bike riding with my boyfriend in o'neil regional park in trabuco canyon, ca and we stopped for some sightseeing. took a few pictures of the landscape and later that evening downloaded them to our laptop. that's when we noticed a "spot" in one of the pictures. we hadn't noticed it at the time of taking the shot. to us it doesn't really look like a bird or a plane so we hope you could help us find out what it was! attached you'll find the picture.
content.summary: Ufo appears in a picture we took on a bike ride

content.detailedDescription:
This sighting took place in madison, connecticut. i was at
a beach in madison in the late evening.  i was sitting on
the beach with a friend about twenty feet from the water.
while we were talking i noticed what i thought was a shooting star several miles east of us and traveling from
south to  north.  at that time i thought it was quite odd
to see a shooting star as we were under fully overcast
skies.  i didn't give it any more thought since i was more
interested in the girl i was with.  

several minutes later i noticed the tops of distant trees
being luminated much like a cars headlights light up trees
on a distant mountain.  again i thought it was odd as
there are no trees that tall in the direction i was looking.
this still wasn't enough to distract me from the girl.  though i did mention both occurances to her.

several minutes later as we talked we both noticed it
getting lighter where we were sitting.  we looked around
and didn't see anything unusual until we looked up.

sitting at about 45 degrees above us and about 100 feet
away was a glowing sphere about 3 feet in diameter.  it was
completely silent.  it was slowly rotating and had a 
texture that looked very much like liquid crystal, the
type used in lcd displays.

for several minutes it didn't move at all. then it
slowly started to follow the edge of the water coming
toward us for several more minutes. it then instantly
shot north just over the trees.  it didn't appear to 
accelerate, it seemed to instantly be going at whatever
speed it went leaving nothing more than a slight woosh
sound. it was out of sight in less than one second.

we sat back down and needless to say that was the subject
of conversation for the next 20 minutes.  we then noticed
the same light around us and when we looked up, it was back
in almost the same position.  again it sat there for a
minute and again started to follow the edge of the water.
this time however, shortly after starting to move it 
very rapidly carved out a star shape, as you would draw
a star on paper, but each leg was about 40 feet. on the
last leg of the star it shot down into the water and
crashed about 100 feet from where we were standing
and only about 20 feet out in the water.  the star pattern
and the crash all happend in well under a second.

it went out of site for about 30 seconds under water.
i ran to the edge of the water adjacent to the
object.  it then popped back up and was floating on
the surface.  it was broken with about an 18 inch hole
that was pointing toward me.  it was still glowing
and i could see some of the insides.  it was a hollow
sphere with about a 1/2 inch wall thickness. there was
a bundle of what appeared to be fiber optic type cable
hanging over the edge of the hole that were also glowing. that was everything i could see.

i started to run into the water to grab it but about
three steps into it i stopped, thinking that might
not be a smart thing to do since i don't know what
it is, and it's broken.  the thought ran through my
head "am i willing to die to have this thing?" the
answer was no.  i stood there for about 10 more minutes.
it slowly started to dim and it finally sank right there.

prior to this incident i never really gave ufo's much
thought beyond entertainment value.  but that was 
a convincer for me as it was for my friend.

thanks for letting me share my experience.

andy
content.summary: Ufo crash

content.detailedDescription: I had just gotten back from the movie theater with my roomate , we went to the balcony of our apartmet to smoke a cigarrete.As usual i am always looking at the sky at night , i am a great admirer of stars and the moon. all of a sudden i saw this 6 bright redish orange flying objects , they were the size of the stars ,they were coming from down the horizon on the left size of the sky .They were flying close together but not in a linear ,ascendent and descendent directions ,there was also a helicopter flying at the same time on the sight!.I imediatelly told my roomate of what i was seing , he asked me what are those things as we stared at the objects.We started losing sight of them when the light went across our building , that's when 4 more appeared following them from the half of the sky , same colors , and were flying in the same direction of the previous 6 ones! i have never seen something like that in the sky but i knew right of way that they were ufos! my roomate had always been skeptical about this subject but now he thinks that there's definately something out there! unfortunately i didn't have a camera handy to record the sight ,i was so excited that i didn't even think about the camera!
content.summary: 10 bright redish orange ufos

content.detailedDescription:
Home
looking
unknown
spinning moving at right angles
as on multimedia
looking away
content.summary: Metalic and spinning object changing shape and direction

content.detailedDescription: I was in the backyard laying on a trampoline with my girlfriend, we were talking, looking up at the sky. three tiny white objects started to pass overhead, almost in a triangular pattern. it startled me at first because it obviously wasnt an airplane, at first i thought they were birds, seagulls actually, but they were too bright for so late at night. they traveled east to west pretty much straight over my backyard in about 30 seconds, i could see them, the same bright white color, no darkness to them, until they went out of sight over the trees. no noise, moved smoothly, no jerky motions, all moved in a pattern. i believe in ufos, but i wont jump to conclusions on this. it was a odd set of something moving in the sky and only after i saw them, did i realize what it might be.

I was laying behind a church about to fall a sleep and suddenly i see what i thought was a satalite passs by in the wsky but very low i remember thingking that there was a oval shape to its form but was not sure. the lights flashed whith no certain pattern randomly.I would say about 3 to 5 minutes the same object passed by . i realized it was not a satalite so i watched to see if i would see it again and it crossed the sky once more at the same height in the dark sky of the night i tried to see any shape but couldnt be sure, i recall and oval of dark matter.Also with each pass  there was a low hum or vibration type sound. july 1 . now on the second i seen the same object but much higher up but the flashing of the 2 red lights and one white (like a diamond)then what i thought was a plane appeared to cross my eye sight it had 3 or 4 white flashing lights there was a hum and a vibration sound sort of with a srech then it forward in too what appeard to be a big storm cloud then a sound like (can not describe with words)it just vanished
content.summary: Lights in position of a triangle, 2 red blinking lights and one like a diamond when the sun glares upon it

content.detailedDescription:
A friend and i were just south of fulton, ny at about 9pm.
we stopped for a "nature call".
i looked up into the sky and saw a orange cigar shaped object moving slowly from the nw.

i told my friend to look at this.
as we watched, the object stopped and a piece of the same color fell from it.
we watched as the piece fell and suddenly burst into flames.

the object then moved off in the same direction it came from.

i was very excited to see something like this and to this day do not believe it was from earth.

my friend who does not believe even after seeing this object
was not impressed.

when i first saw the object i was i thought it was unusual abecause of the circumstances of its behavior. we had just 
went to the moon a and i didn't then and still don't believe
we had this technology at that time.

it was a crystal clear night with many stars.

doesn't this prove that it was out of the earths atmosphere
because it fell then burst into flames?

after over 30 years, this memory is as clear as the day it happened.
content.summary: Orange cigar shaped object. drops piece of same color that bursts into flames.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in the kitchen last night messing with the computer when my wife, who was outside smoking at the time, stuck her head in the door and said, "come here, i see a ufo."  my first thought was that it would be an airplane.  i went outside and saw a yellowish-white steady light that was about the same intensity and size as a bright star travelling across the night sky going from southwest to northeast and appeared to be approximately 10,000 feet high and going about the same speed as a jet aircraft would.  i first thought "airplane" but noticed that it had no strobe lights and no green/red nav lights.  the intensity of the light stayed steady as it passed over and off into the distance which would not typically be the case if it were aircraft landing lights that i saw.  my wife said that the object appeared to be in a lazy zig-zag motion, and i saw this too but only after she mentioned it so this may have just been the power of suggestion.  i took no photos or video of the event, the thought never even crossed my mind to do so.
content.summary: A bright steady light was seen in the sky traveling southwest to northeast

content.detailedDescription: I was in my front yard in front of my house and i was walking to my grandma's house who is my neighbor. i was holding a pear of my boxers. i was little,and i would always look arround to see my surroundings out of fear of a animal would attack me. that is when i saw a large suacer. the suacer had at least 30 red lights all arround the edge of it. it was very big. it moved across the sky slowy. it was not a plane or helicopter, because i love planes and  helicopters,and i know what they look like and sound like. it did not make any sounds. i saw it in the sky for about 15-20 seconds. i was scared so i ran down to my front purch. at first i thought it was a planes but i soon raelized it was not. i told my mom and she did not understand what i was describing to her. i lost sight of it when it started to head towards the woods and then it disappeared into the wood.
content.summary: Large suacer, at lease 30 red lights,

content.detailedDescription:
1. sitting in a hot tub talking to my sister-in-law, jeanne.
2. a reflection, in the window, of bright magenta light  and the look on jeanne's face.
3. a hoovering ball of magenta light.
4. the first one hovered over a cherry tree for a few seconds then flew off flying topographically for about 3 miles then up into the clouds. all this within a few seconds. as it flew faster it changed color to a white light. then another came out of the cherry orchard from a different place about 300 yards away and did the same exact flight. the third came up in yet a different part of the orchard and flew along the columbia river several miles and then up into the clouds. all three went to the same place but took different routes getting there.
5. we told eachother that we were going to stay quiet. no one would believe this. it wasn't until years later that we decided to tell people. it was amazing how many other people around here have seen ufo's.
6. they flew out of sight into a cloud mass.
i would love to draw a picture for you but i can't with this computer.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Small balls of light
